library("StreamCatTools")

# Load your datasets

nlcd <- data.frame()

years <- c(2001, 2004, 2006, 2008, 2011, 2013, 2016, 2019)

for (i in length(years)) {
  nlcd_i <- sc_nlcd(years[i], state = "TX")
  nlcd_i %>% mutate(Year = years[i])
  nlcd <- rbind(nlcd, nlcd_i)
}

TX_nlcd_2019 <- sc_nlcd(2019, state = "TX")
